EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been Closed over 72 hours
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Case.Contact}, Thank you for contacting NCR Service Desk, but this Case has been closed over the 72 business hours limit with the following details: Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Site Name: {!Case.Site_Id__c} Store Number / Branch: {!Case.Store_Branch_No__c} Address: {!Case.Address__c} Created Date/Time: {!Case.CreatedDate__c} Priority: {!Case.Priority} Software Product: {!Case.Creation_Category__c} Brief Description: {!Case.Description} Customer Reference Number: {!Case.GUID_Id__c} You may be getting this message due to replying to an old email thread associated with this closed Case. If you need assistance, please create a new case regarding your inquiry and reference this Case. If this is urgent, feel free to contact the Service Desk, and we will be happy assisting you.. Sincerely, NCR Service Desk {!Case.Support_Phone__c} / {!Case.Support_Email__c}
